text: Anna Maria Bottini (24 March 1916 – 9 August 2020) was an Italian actress. She was born in Milan. Her best known roles were in The Leopard, The Law and Angels of Darkness. Bottini died on 9 August 2020 in Giove, Umbria at the age of 104.Morta Anna Maria Bottini a 104 anni, recitò ne Il Gattopardo e fu volto della camomilla Bonomelli ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1916 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Actors from Milan Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian radio personalities Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian centenarians
title: Anna Maria Bottini
